entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
